alert.note: Alert for Northern Saratoga; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 20 at 10:42PM EDT until October 21 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Northern Saratoga, Northern Washington and Southeast Warren Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Saratoga; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren
